details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

<tt src={/class-icons/star-guardian/sia/stellar-ix-canopus.png} tip={Stellar IX - Canopus (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/star-guardian/sia/stellar-ii-algol.png} tip={Stellar II - Algol and Boom (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/star-guardian/sia/starlight.png} tip={Starlight (1st Job)}>

primary.name: DISCLAIMER
primary.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

primary.name: Return to Oort
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Oort.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Star Force Enhancement
primary.shortDesc: Increases Magic ATT based on equipped Star Force value.

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 2400 sec, Attack Power & Magic ATT: +4%\nCooldown: 300 sec

primary.name: DISCLAIMER
primary.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

primary.name: Ray
primary.shortDesc: [Marking Skill] Fires a ray of starlight to deal damage to multiple enemies.\n[Stellagram Reset] If you press the skill key along with the down arrow key, the current Stellagram record is immediately reset. The Stellagram Reset feature cannot be used midair.

primary.name: Starry Flow
primary.shortDesc: Teleports a certain distance forward

primary.name: Stellar I - Antares
primary.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Ray - Ray - Ray - Ray
[Constellation Skill] Complete the Antares fusion to summon a rabbit hole in front of you for a set duration, dealing immediate damage and pulling in enemies at that location for continuous damage.
You can summon up to 4 rabbit holes at the same time.
Unaffected by Damage Reflect.

primary.name: Stellar Marking
primary.shortDesc:
Activates Stellar Marking to record Skill Marks on the Stellagram and fuse a constellation skill.
[Marking Skill] When a Marking Skill is cast, the Skill Mark will be recorded on the Stellagram.
[Stellagram] The Stellagram activates when the first Skill Mark is recorded. It can record up to 4 Skill Marks.
[Constellation Skill Activation] When the fourth Skill Mark is recorded, the recorded skills fuse to create a completed constellation. If the fusion doesn't match a constellation, the Stellagram will reset without casting a constellation skill. Constellation fusion is based on the type and number of Skill Marks recorded, and is not affected by the order of the recorded Skill Marks.
[Stellagram Reset] If you press the Ray skill along with the down arrow, the current Stellagram record immediately resets. The Stellagram cannot be reset midair.
[Constellation Skill Fusion] Constellation fusion requirements are listed in the descriptions of each constellation skill.
[Additional Functionality: Effect] Displays a Stellagram effect above you while the additional functionality is active. (The Stellagram UI at the top-left will always display.)

primary.name: Starlight
primary.shortDesc:
Casts Starlight Link at your location when the attack key is pressed or whenever a constellation skill activates.
[Starlight Link] Releases rays of starlight to deal damage to a single target, and additionally shifts the rays to enemies near the target to chain damage. The rays will disappear after shifting a certain number of times.
[Cannot Shift to Same Target] The rays will disappear if there are no additional enemies near the target.
[Additional Damage if only the Target is Hit] If the rays disappear without shifting to other targets, they deal additional damage to the target.
If you press the attack key to trigger Starlight Link, the shift count will decrease, and the effect of additional damage will not be applied to a single target. If constellation fusion fails to activate a constellation skill, only Starlight Link will be activated.
If constellation fusion fails to activate a constellation skill, only Starlight Link will be activated.
Unaffected by Damage Reflect.

primary.name: Starry Leap
primary.shortDesc: Tap Jump again while jumping to Double Jump.\nWhile jumping, tap the up arrow and Jump at the same time to jump up.

primary.name: Starry Wave
primary.shortDesc: Hold jump to glide and slow descent speed while moving horizontally. Release and re-hold jump to glide again after a cooldown.

primary.name: Astral Movement
primary.shortDesc: Increases Movement Speed, Jump, and Knockback Resistance

primary.name: DISCLAIMER
primary.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

primary.name: Boom
primary.shortDesc: [Marking Skill] Explodes starlight to deal damage to surrounding enemies and records Boom on the Stellagram.

primary.name: Stellar II - Algol
primary.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Boom - Boom - Boom - Boom
[Constellation Skill] When the Algol fusion is complete, he will be summoned to your location as a lizard for a set duration, seeking out a nearby enemy to deal continuous damage.
If the Algol fusion is completed while a lizard is summoned, the Algol duration will not reset. Instead, the buff time will accumulate and increase. However the duration can't exceed a total of 120 seconds, and the buff will end if you move to another area.
[Boss Monster DMG Reduction] When Algol deals damage to a boss monster, only 5% of the Final Damage will be dealt (full damage is applied only when dealing damage to normal monsters).
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Celestial Alignment
primary.shortDesc: Temporarily increase %Crit Damage for you and your party members.

primary.name: Oort Wave
primary.shortDesc: Increases Attack Speed of all active skills, excluding 1st Job Adv. Skills. Additionally grants the Oort Wave buff every time a constellation skill activates.\n[Oort Wave] Increases marking skill Attack Speed while the buff is active. Can be stacked up to 3 times, and additionally increases Attack Speed with each stack.\nAdditionally increases Magic ATT

primary.name: Starlight Enhancement I
primary.shortDesc: Increases Starlight Skill Damage. (Applies to Starlight Link effect activated by Bellatrix.)

primary.name: Astral Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: Decreases damage received proportionally to normal attacks and HP-Scaled Attack damage when hit, and consumes an equal of MP instead.\nNo more than 20% of Max MP can be consumed.\nAlso reduces damage taken.

primary.name: Astral Energy
primary.shortDesc: Increases %Damage, %Max MP, and MP Recovery

primary.name: Astral Force
primary.shortDesc: Increases Magic ATT and %Crit Rate

primary.name: DISCLAIMER
primary.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

primary.name: Pole
primary.shortDesc: [Marking Skill] Summons starlight in front of you for a short time. The starlight deals continuous damage to nearby enemies.\n[Single Mark Fusion] If Pole is recorded as the first Skill Mark, Alchiba will be completed as a single mark fusion. If Pole is recorded as the second mark or beyond, the Skill Marks won't be completed as a single fusion, but will be retained to fuse into other constellation skills.

primary.name: Stellar III - Alchiba
primary.shortDesc: [Stellagram Fusion] Pole\n[Constellation Skill] The Alchiba fusion grants the Witch's Protection buff to you, your party members, or ally targets, which temporarily nullifies damage from all attacks when complete. The buff disappears immediately upon nullifying damage.\nCharacters who have received the Witch's Protection buff cannot receive the same buff for a short time.

primary.name: Stellar IV - Bellatrix
primary.shortDesc: [Stellagram Fusion] Ray - Ray - Boom - Pole\n[Constellation Skill] Bellatrix fusion temporarily grants you a Bellatrix buff. While the buff is active, your %Damage will increase, and Starlight Link will activate at your location at set intervals.\n[Additional Buff Duration Increase] If you cast Pole while the Bellatrix buff is active, the buff duration will increase. However, it cannot increase beyond the max buff duration.

primary.name: Stellar V - Fomalhaut
primary.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Boom - Boom - Boom - Pole
[Constellation Skill] Fomalhaut fusion temporarily grants you a Fomalhaut buff. While the buff is active, a Horned Conch is summoned that spins around you, dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies. You will summon 1 Horned Conch at first, but you can summon up to 4 depending on the number of stacked Oort Wave buffs.
[Additional Buff Duration Increase] If you cast Pole while the Fomalhaut buff is active, the buff duration will increase. However, it cannot increase beyond the max buff duration.
Unaffected by Damage Reflect.

primary.name: Stellar Enhancement I
primary.shortDesc: Additionally increases %Damage of Antares and Algol

primary.name: Starlight Enhancement II
primary.shortDesc: Further increases %Damage of Starlight. (Applies to the Starlight Link effect activated by Bellatrix.)

primary.name: Astral Elements
primary.shortDesc: Increases Magic ATT, %Crit Rate, and DEF

primary.name: Astral Invincibility
primary.shortDesc: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance and reduces damage taken

primary.name: DISCLAIMER
primary.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

primary.name: Link
primary.shortDesc: [Marking Skill] Lights up the sky with refractive starlight that restores HP for you and your party members and grants you a buff that temporarily adds additional damage to Ray and Boom. Also records Link on the Stellagram.\n[Single Mark Fusion] If Link is recorded as the first Skill Mark, Sadalmelik will be completed as a single mark fusion. If Link is recorded as the second mark or beyond, the Skill Marks won't be completed as a single fusion, but will be retained to fuse into other constellation skills.

primary.name: Stellar Equalize
primary.shortDesc:
[Stellar Equalize Skill] Assign a constellation skill to Stellar Equalize by tapping the Stellar Equalize button in the skill UI. Only one constellation skill can be assigned at a time, and previously-assigned constellation skills will be disabled.
Constellation skills have different cooldowns based on skill level. Alchiba and Sadalmelik have separate cooldowns applied as exclusions.
[1st/2nd Job Adv. Skill] 10s
[3rd/4th Job Adv./Hyper Skill] 30s
[Alchiba/Sadalmelik] 90s
[V Skill] 60s
[Immediate Constellation Activation] Tapping the Stellar Equalize skill bypasses Stellagram fusion and activates the assigned constellation skill immediately. When a constellation skill is activated with Stellar Equalize, the Stellagram resets.
Stellar Equalize is not affected by cooldown reduction effects.
[Passive] Increases Magic ATT.

primary.name: Stellar VI - Izar
primary.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Boom - Boom - Pole - Link
[Constellation Skill] When the Izar fusion is complete, he deals damage to enemies in a large area and summons 3 flying blades that track enemies for a period of time. The blades search for nearby enemies within a certain range to deal damage, then look for another enemy or attack the same enemy again. The blades will disappear when they reach their maximum attack count.
[Blade Boss Monster DMG Reduction] When the blades deal damage to a boss monster, only 5% of the Final DMG will be dealt (full damage is applied only when dealing damage to normal monsters).
Unaffected by Damage Reflect.

primary.name: Stellar VII - Vega
primary.shortDesc: [Stellagram Fusion] Ray - Ray - Ray - Link\n[Constellation Skill] When the Vega fusion is complete, a Starlit Gust will be unleashed to deal damage to enemies in a large area and grants you a Starlight Wings buff for a period of time, dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies.\nUnaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Stellar VIII - Sadalmelik
primary.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Link
[Constellation Skill] When the Sadalmelik fusion is complete, you, your party member, or a target ally will receive a buff that grants Invincibility against all attacks for a short time.
An additional buff is granted to you and your party members for a short time, decreasing damage received from HP-Scaled Attack DMG while the buff is active.
Characters who received the Sadalmelik buff can't receive it again for a set duration.

primary.name: Appear
primary.shortDesc:
Temporarily increases %Final Damage and enhance Ray, Boom, Pole, and Link.
[Enhanced Ray] Increased target count, hit range, and hit count.
[Enhanced Boom] Increased target count, hit range, and hit count.
[Enhanced Pole] Increased target count, hit range, and hit count.
[Enhanced Link] Increased effect range and HP recovered.

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Pulsing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs

primary.name: Stellar Enhancement II
primary.shortDesc: Further increases %Damage of Antares and Algol. Increases %Damage of Fomalhaut.

primary.name: Starlight Enhancement III
primary.shortDesc: Further increaes %Damage of Starlight. (Applies to the Starlight Link effect activated by Bellatrix.)

primary.name: Empowered Ray
primary.shortDesc: Enhances Ray to Empowered Ray to increase target range, target count, hit count, and %Damage

primary.name: Enhanced Boom
primary.shortDesc: Enhances Boom to Enhanced Boom to increase target range, target count, hit count, and %Damage

primary.name: Astral Assimilation
primary.shortDesc: Increases %Crit Damage and %Crit Rate

primary.name: Astral Infinity
primary.shortDesc: Increases Magic ATT, %Damage, and %Boss Damage

hyperPassive.name: DISCLAIMER
hyperPassive.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

hyperPassive.name: Marking - Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases the %Final Damage of the additional damage triggered by Ray, Boom, Pole, and Link.

hyperPassive.name: Marking - Extra Strike
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases the hit count of the additional damage triggered by Ray, Boom, Pole, and Link.

hyperPassive.name: Marking - Persist
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Changes Link's additional damage buff duration.

hyperPassive.name: Stellar Marking - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When a constellation skill is activated, an additional Starlight Link is activated.

hyperPassive.name: Stellar Marking - Reinforce Duration
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When a constellation skill is activated, the %Final Damage is increased for 15 seconds.\nEach time a buff is granted, the buff time will not reset, but instead accumulate and increase. However, it cannot accumulate more than 45 seconds of time.

hyperPassive.name: Stellar Marking - Reduce Damage
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When a constellation skill is activated, the HP-Scaled Attack Damage is decreased for 15 seconds.\nEach time a buff is granted, the buff time will not reset, but instead accumulate and increase. However, it cannot accumulate more than 45 seconds of time.

hyperActive.name: DISCLAIMER
hyperActive.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

hyperActive.name: Stellar IX - Canopus
hyperActive.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Ray - Ray - Pole - Link
[Constellation Skill] Completing the Canopus fusion deals damage to enemies in a large area and summons Canopus as an anchor in front of you for a short time, dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies.
When the Oort Wave buff has maximum stacks, Canopus's first-time attack hit count is tripled.
You can summon another Canopus anchor when one is already summoned, but only as many as 2 can be active at one time.
Unaffected by Damage Reflect.

hyperActive.name: Stellar X - Capella
hyperActive.shortDesc: [Stellagram Fusion] Ray - Ray - Boom - Link\n[Constellation Skill] When the Capella fusion is complete, you will receive the Light of Capella buff for a period of time, which creates an aura that increases %Crit Damage and %Crit Rate for you and your party members.\n[Star Reversion] The duration of the Light of Capella buff resets every time you cast Izar, Vega, Canopus, and Sadalmelik.

fifthMain.name: DISCLAIMER
fifthMain.desc: Skill info is unconfirmed and subject to change. Skill info are referenced and modified from MapleStory M. Info will be updated in July, currently on hiatus!

fifthMain.name: Shine
fifthMain.shortDesc: [Marking Skill] Emits starlight that spreads with intensity for a short time, increasing %Final Damage for you and your party members. Also grants the Oort Wave buff only to yourself up to the maximum stacking limit. Additionally, records Shine in the Stellagram\n[V Skill: Additional Effect every 5 levels] When skill level 5 is reached, cooldown is reduced, and it will further reduce every 5 levels.

fifthMain.name: Stellar XI - Sirius
fifthMain.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Ray - Boom - Pole - Shine
[Constellation Skill] When the Sirius fusion is complete, he will be summoned to your location as a wolf, dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies for a short time.
When the fusion duration expires, Sirius will let out a howl that increases %Final Damage for you and your party members for a short time.
Unaffected by Damage Reflect.
You can summon up to 2 wolves and their howls at the same time.
[V Skill: Additional Effect every 5 levels] When skill level 5 is reached, the wolf and its howl will last for a longer time, and the duration will further increase every 5 levels.

fifthMain.name: Stellar XII - Sadalsuud
fifthMain.shortDesc:
[Stellagram Fusion] Shine
[Constellation Skill] When the Sadalsuud fusion is complete, you will be granted with the Star's Blessing, increasing %Boss Damage and %Crit Rate, as well as having the hourglass summoned to your location. While the hourglass is summoned, you and your party are granted a Death and Rebirth buff.
[Death and Rebirth] While the Death and Rebirth buff is active, you will revive if you receive a fatal attack, but the hourglass's remaining duration will decrease. The revive effect will be applied even if the hourglass has less than the decreasing value, and the hourglass will disappear when its remaining duration reaches 0 seconds.
[Hourglass Disappearance] Only one hourglass can be active in a party at one time. If you and another party member summon an hourglass as Sia, the hourglass that was summoned first will disappear. When the hourglass disappears, a cooldown of 30 sec will be applied to Shine. However, if the cooldown time is more than 30 sec, it will not be applied.
[Shine Cooldown Reset] When the Sadalsuud fusion is complete while the hourglass has not been summoned, Shine's cooldown will be reset.

fifthMain.name: Timebinder
fifthMain.shortDesc: [Time Retrograde] Enemies within the affected range are temporarily immobilized, and will be immune to immobilization statuses for a period of time. Immobilization from Sadalsuud also applies to boss monsters.\n[Skills Acquired Simultaneously] When learning Stellar XII - Sadalsuud

fifthMain.name: Savior's Circle
fifthMain.shortDesc: Grants a buff that changes the flow of constellations to increase %Final Damage and gain an additional effect for a period of time.\n[Activate All Constellation Enhancement Effects] All constellation enhancement effects are activated while the buff is active, applying both selected and unselected effects simultaneously. As for certain enhancement effects, they're also applied to Constellation Skills that were active before the buff was applied, and those effects will disappear at the same time when the buff expires.\n[Exploding Starlight] Further increases the hit count of Antares, Algol, and Sirius while the buff is active.
